frame.name: The Funcaster
frame.subtitle: A Tribute to Warplets Holders
frame.description: The Funcaster is a special edition NFT collection with a $10,000$ supply, built exclusively for Warplets holders within the Base ecosystem. This project directly links your on-chain identity (your Warplets FID) to the art.Every Funcaster is unique and deterministically generated. Our smart contract uses a unique algorithm that draws specific numbers from the Warplets FID you use for minting, resulting in a unique tie to your existing digital asset.
